title: backyard_garden_water_storage_full_status
summary: All water barrels in the backyard garden zone are filled, totaling 600 liters of stored water.
description: This data unit documents the confirmed full water storage status across all water barrels in the backyard garden zone. The zone contains a total of three water barrels, each with an approximate capacity of 200 liters, resulting in a combined water reserve of approximately 600 liters available for garden use.

quantitative_note.note: Capacities based on known container specifications and visual confirmation.

external_reference.note: Image confirms full water level in backyard garden water barrel.
